official-title.#text: To adjust the boundary of the Arapaho National Forest, Colorado, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

quote.#tail:
and dated
			 November 6, 2013, and described as lots three, four, eight, and nine of
			 section 13, Township 4 North, Range 76 West, Sixth Principal Meridian,
			 Colorado.

text.#text:
The boundary of the Arapaho National Forest in the State of Colorado is adjusted to incorporate the
			 approximately 92.95 acres of land generally depicted as

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall include all Federal land within the boundary described in
in the Bowen Gulch Protection Area established under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 6 of the Colorado Wilderness Act of 1993

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall be considered to be the boundaries of the Arapaho
			 National Forest as in existence on January 1, 1965.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
,
			 the boundaries of the Arapaho National Forest, as modified under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 7 of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965/s:7

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is authorized to acquire non-Federal lands within the boundary described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be closed to public
			 motorized use.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: The lands described within the boundary described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
who historically have
			 accessed their lands through lands now or hereafter owned by the United
			 States within the boundary described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall have the
			 continued right of motorized access to their lands across the exiting
			 roadway.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Arapaho National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2014/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
regarding motorized travel, the owners of any non-Federal lands
			 within the boundary described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 6(f) of the Colorado Wilderness Act of 1993
